Name: Nxt-ID, Inc
Description: Nxt-ID, Inc., a security technology company, engages in the development of products and solutions for security, healthcare, financial technology, and Internet of Things (IoT) markets. It offers non-monitored and monitored personal emergency response systems (PERS), including landline and cell-based options; TRM Platform offers an opportunity for a range of devices to become payment-enabled; and Flip, a contactless payment device, which enables Bitcoin holders to make contactless payment transactions at millions of retail locations. The company sells its products through dealers and distributors. Nxt-ID, Inc. was founded in 2011 and is based in Sebastian, Florida.
